text: Ezɨ gumaziba an akam ikara, “Kornilius 100 plan mɨdorozir gumazibar garir gumazim nɨ bagha e amadazɨma e ize. A Godɨn damazimɨn deragha an apengan itir gumazim. Judan gumazamiziba bar a gifongegha an ziam fe. Ezɨma Godɨn enselɨn mam a mɨgɨa ghaze, nɨ Pita bagh akam amadaghtɨ a nɨn dɨpenimɨn izegh mɨgɨrɨgɨatabar amutɨ nɨ da baragh.”
